audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0499_PC_MA_HV027_1726.372_1728.132.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0500_PC_MA_HV027_1728.132_1730.013.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0508_PC_MA_HV027_1750.502_1754.191.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0519_PC_MA_HV027_1777.302_1778.103.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0520_PC_MA_HV027_1778.103_1780.245.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0524_PC_MA_HV027_1785.049_1786.09.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0526_PC_MA_HV027_1793.04_1796.023.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0527_PC_MA_HV027_1796.023_1798.406.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0533_PC_MA_HV027_1812.737_1815.138.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0543_PC_MA_HV027_1842.141_1843.742.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0546_PC_MA_HV027_1854.936_1857.257.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0583_PC_MA_HV027_1958.172_1960.453.wav

text: Aí no meu íntimo né, eu pensei assim, longe da minha mulher, dos meus filhos, não tinham pequeno ainda né, da minha mãe, falei, meu Deus, se tem uma obra na minha vida né, não deixa eu morrer sem ver minha mãe.

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0587_PC_MA_HV027_1974.636_1976.497.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0588_PC_MA_HV027_1976.497_1977.237.wav

audio_file: data/mupe/PC_MA_HV027/audios/0616_PC_MA_HV027_2060.064_2061.185.wav
